channel.title: George Mackay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Rose of Nevada’ Review: George MacKay and Callum Turner Are Caught in a Time Loop in Mark Jenkin’s Haunting Drama
item.description: A fishing village in Cornwall is the setting for the latest eerie work from the director of ‘Enys Men,’ premiering in Venice.

item.title: ‘Rose of Nevada’ Review: George MacKay and Callum Turner Are Caught in a Time Loop in Mark Jenkin’s Haunting Drama
item.description: A fishing village in Cornwall is the setting for the latest eerie work from the director of ‘Enys Men,’ premiering in Venice.

item.title: George MacKay’s Venice Double Feature: “These Films Were Made With Such Love”
item.description: The British star unpacks two of his Venice-bound films: Mark Jenkin’s time-travel feature ‘Rose of Nevada’ with fellow countryman Callum Turner and the Marianne Faithfull documentary ‘Broken English’:
